title: UNUSUAL WEBBING, UNNATURAL CRIMES
description: Camping alone in a national park, Detective Logico dreamt about ancient ruins and a park ranger being murdered. When he woke up, he saw the dream had come true.

suspects.name: MAYOR HONEY
suspects.description: He's on a retreat in the woods to reevaluate his political prospects in the wake of the latest scandal (murder).

suspects.name: PRINCIPAL APPLEGREEN
suspects.description: A strict principal about everything except getting away with murder. His hands are always covered in chalk.

suspects.name: COACH RASPBERRY
suspects.description: One of the best coaches this side of the Mississippi, regardless of which side you're on.

suspects.name: CHANCELLOR TUSCANY
suspects.description: As the head of Deduction College, she has deduced the best way to play the game of academic power politics: reward your allies, punish your enemies, and don't be afraid to kill.

weapons.name: A POISONOUS SPIDER
weapons.description: Definitely not an accident: its unusual webbing shows that this spider is not native to these woods.
weapons.specs: LIGHTWEIGHT • MADE OF A LIVE ANIMAL

weapons.name: A PAIR OF GARDENING SHEARS
weapons.description: Rusty, heavy, and dangerous. You could trim a hedge or years off someone's life.

weapons.name: A BOW AND ARROW
weapons.description: Look at this thing: what a beauty! Look at the feathers on the arrows as they fly toward your head.
weapons.specs: MEDIUM-WEIGHT • MADE OF ORGANIC, LINEN, & FEATHERS

weapons.name: A CLIMBING AXE
weapons.description: You could climb up a cliff and behold the beauty of the natu-ral landscape. Or kill someone.

locations.name: THE ANCIENT RUINS
locations.description: Maybe they are some kind of marker to tell aliens locations of interest?

locations.name: THE HOT SPRINGS SPA
locations.description: People travel from hundreds of miles to take pictures of them-selves in these hot springs.

locations.name: THE PARTY LAKE
locations.description: People have been known to drown in this lake, so people have been known to hide bod-ies in its ice-cold waters, too.

locations.name: THE ENTRANCE GATE
locations.description: A huge gate that advertises a place where you can disconnect from the modern world, for a price.

motives: AS PART OF A REAL ESTATE SCAM
clues: Logico had seen poisoned spiders used before, but only ever as part of a real estate scam.
Principal Applegreen was not at the entrance gate.
The shortest suspect had a climbing axe.
Traces of a weapon made of a live animal were found in the ancient ruins.
The suspect who wanted to see if they could had a weapon made at least partially of ceramic.
Coach Raspberry was seen swimming in ice-cold water.
The suspect who wanted to escape blackmail was seen outdoors.
Some unusual webbing was found beside the forest ranger.
